definition: to save sb's life/(interj.) Help!/Save me!
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
(one's) last straw to clutch at/one's last hope

sentences.english: Men also receive health education and testing that could save their life.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏男士還接受一些可以救命的健康教育和檢查。

sentences.english: Children of the rescue work continued, suddenly heard "help" the voice shouted.
sentences.chinese: 子弟們繼續着救援工作，突然聽到“救命”的呼喊聲。

sentences.english: They tried yelling, even though it was hard to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 他們試着喊救命，儘管連呼吸都十分的困難。

sentences.english: From a different vantage, credit was an economic white knight.
sentences.chinese: 從一個不同的角度來看，信用是經濟的救命恩人。

sentences.english: I heard a woman's cry for help.
sentences.chinese: 我聽到一個女人喊救命。

sentences.english: What would you do if you heard your neighbours shout:help .help ?
sentences.chinese: 如果你聽到你的鄰居大喊救命，你會採取什麼措施？

sentences.english: I heard a womans crying for help.
sentences.chinese: 我聽到一個女人喊救命。

sentences.english: It is normal that he love you.
sentences.chinese: 再說他還是你的救命恩人。

sentences.english: This house might prove their salvation.
sentences.chinese: 這所房屋是可以救命的。

sentences.english: you ask, knowing no payment could ever suffice.
sentences.chinese: 你問道，雖然你知道救命之恩無價可報。

sentences.english: The new CFO was beatific to accompany the company out of the red.
sentences.chinese: 這位新的財務長被派來把公司從赤字中救命出來。

sentences.english: White recognized the voice: It came from one of their rescuers.
sentences.chinese: 小白聽出了那個聲音，那是她們的一位救命恩人。

sentences.english: The money the migrants sent back was a lifeline.
sentences.chinese: 勞工寄回家的都是救命錢。

sentences.english: People are saying stem cells are basically going to be  the new miracle drug.
sentences.chinese: 人們常說幹細胞將會是新的救命的奇藥。

sentences.english: It springs up from a fountain in the courtyard of a bewitched castle;
sentences.chinese: 救命水呀，是從一個魔宮院內的泉眼裏冒出來的。

definition: quick witted in an emergency/able to react resourcefully
to rescue/to help out of difficulties/to save the situation
to yell/to shout/to call out for (a person)
